effects.display_string: Set: Tiger Palm increases the damage of your next melee ability by 5.0%.
Set: Your other melee abilities increase the damage of your next Tiger Palm by 25%, stacking up to 6 times. 15% of Tiger Palm's damage is dealt onto nearby enemies, reduced beyond 5 targets.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Upon entering combat, and every 60 sec, gain either Massive or Miniature for 30 sec.

Miniature
Reduces your size by 20%, and increases your Speed by 1,204 and Haste by 8,068.

Massive
Increases your size by 20%, maximum health by 297,781, and Agility by 7,537.
Use: Look through the lens and randomly scale up or down, gaining 6,545 Critical Strike or Haste for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
